entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:47 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 6:18 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: W 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
